title: Prepaid gas, CTA cards will be available to some Chicagoans pending City Council approval - WGN TV Chicago
content: Prepaid gas, CTA cards will be available to some Chicagoans pending City Council approval  WGN TV ChicagoView Full Coverage on Google News
description: CHICAGO — Mayor Lori Lightfoot alongside city leaders on Thursday announced that prepaid gas and CTA cards would be made available to qualifying Chicagoans amid rising gas prices. In a Thursday pre…
